1046560.name: Sounds of Talent: Kpop Adventure
1046560.description:
Become the ultimate Kpop star in this exciting video game adventure. Start building your career from the ground up to become one of the hottest pop sensations in Korea.

Be part of the exciting world of entertainment in Seoul, and be part of the exclusive Gangnam Art School. Your choices affect the whole story.

Will you become a star or will you fail? Do you have what it takes to become the new pop sensation?

Features:
- Deep story engine. Your choices affect everything that happens in the story
- Multiple languages available (English, Spanish and Korean)
- Gather fans as you complete the story
- Customize your group name to fit your style
1046560.supported_languages: 英语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 韩语
